description:
Lucy, Gray, Happy and Carla are surrounded by the Legion Regiment of the Royal Army, while Natsu, Wendy, and Gajeel are facing a forbidden super weapon that repels all magic, piloted by King Faust himself, and Erza has her final showdown with Erza Knightwalker... Exhausted, outnumbered, and on unfamiliar turf, the Fairy Tail wizards have it tough... Is there anyone in Edolas willing to fight for the future of their own country? And what is the prince of Edolas, Mystogan, doing in the Anima Control Room?
Source: crunchyroll
